DOC.brief_summary: To measure cardiopulmonary function individual develop bronchopulmonary dysplasia ( BPD ) Stanford University Medical Center 1964-1973 determine factor associate presence cardiopulmonary function abnormality adolescent young adult .
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : Eleven 22 percent prematurely born human infant Respiratory Distress Syndrome ( RDS ) treat artificial ventilation supplemental oxygen therapy , develop severe chronic lung disease call bronchopulmonary dysplasia . While many child BPD asymptomatic three year age , respiratory symptom abnormal pulmonary function test nine year age . The hypothesis test study abnormality pulmonary function see infant BPD persist adolescence , even asymptomatic child young adult . DESIGN NARRATIVE : A detailed interval pulmonary history take . Pulmonary abnormality determine pulmonary angiography lateral chest x-ray pulmonary function test small airway obstruction , reversible bronchial hyperreactivity , distribution ventilation , air trap hyperinflation , residual interstitial disease edema , vascular bed loss , gas exchange . Right leave ventricular hypertrophy evaluate electrocardiogram . Elevated right ventricular pressure estimate echocardiography doppler ultrasound . The atopic status child determine . Other abnormality , include growth retardation , developmental delay , hear loss , retrolental fibroplasia , neurologic disability see BPD assess history physical examination .
